room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped!" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: We did the kidnapped room, so so so much fun! A definite must do!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped!" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: So much fun! The whole group worked together. No competition, just dedicated team work and we made great time!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped!" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: It was awesome! Worth the 2 hour drive! I'm so greatful to Jacob & Mary they were fabulous! I will be back in January! It's a Must!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped!" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: We were a group of five doing the Kidnap Room and it was so much fun! Even working under pressure we all had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped!" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Challenging and worth every penny!!!!!!! I can't wait to go back and try all of the other rooms. Well done.

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped!" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: My husband and I made this a date night and nothing more test worthy than putting together our time, effort and minds towards the escape from the crazy maniac who thought they could kidnap us and we would go down. ..lol..we had 4 new friends that helped us escape from such fun and exciting memories. Thank you for the knuckle biting, teeth grinding frustration and relationship bonding fun....can't wait to try the zombie room next... .wonderful gift from a friend who knew just what I needed

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped!" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Did the "Kidnapped" room with the boyfriend, and 4 strangers, who came as a group. I was a little worried about working with people I'd never met before, but it was totally fine. We finished with 7 minutes left, and that was with us all working as a group.I would do this with 4 people, minimum. It may be a little too complicated for just two.Our moderator told us that the Kidnapped room has a 20-25% success rate, and that the American Revolution room is a bit easier.We'll be going back for the other rooms, for sure
